duties_responsibilities.duty: Serve as a first point of contact for all visitors, callers and respond to all email inquiries.

Provide all-around administrative support to the Development, Communications, and Membership departments: printing correspondence, data entry, mailing invoices, managing incoming and outgoing correspondence.
Make bank deposits, facilitate vendor payments, organize contracts, and manage database.
Coordinate with building maintenance and oversee day-to-day office facilities operations.
Monitor and order office and kitchen supplies.
